about_the_game:
In a world, where pumpkins come to life...

You control the level to help this little pumpkin reach the top and find it's way home to the witch-house.

With power-up's and loads of collectibles, this arcade platformer promises a cozy and worthwhile experience.

Finish achievements and collect candy to unlock some new cosmetics and content.

As you play and get better at the game, the difficulty will gradually increase.

Prepare yourself for a good time in this exciting upwards-platformer game.

Have fun at bug-hunting!
detailed_description:
In a world, where pumpkins come to life...

You control the level to help this little pumpkin reach the top and find it's way home to the witch-house.

With power-up's and loads of collectibles, this arcade platformer promises a cozy and worthwhile experience.

Finish achievements and collect candy to unlock some new cosmetics and content.

As you play and get better at the game, the difficulty will gradually increase.

Prepare yourself for a good time in this exciting upwards-platformer game.

Have fun at bug-hunting!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Pumpkin Hop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Help the pumpkin jump from platform to platform and collect candy. Give your pumpkin a unique look by unlocking new hats that you can get with the candy you have collected. This game is a fun challenge for young and old.
